name: Tender Arms
description:
Version 2017.01.08 (DDB)

Version features:

-12 color palettes
-Window resizing
-Additional level (4 total)
-CRT filter option

WARNING

This is a short demo of an indefinitely abandoned game - you will complete it in about 5 minutes.

Requires OpenGL 3.3+ support.
